column4: greetings all! I am encountering this error message whenever I try to install any version of ubuntu(kubuntu and xubuntu): the installer encountered an error copying files to the hard disk [Erno 5] Input/output error
there is more but I don't know if I should show that as well
I was in the process of installing and it reached 52% before I received that error message again
: That's typical due to a read/write error on the install media or your hard drive...
